name: Splendia.com
overview:
Splendia is a luxury hotel brand that provides the ultimate on-line reservation service for the discerning leisure and business traveller.

Since launching in 2004 they have grown rapidly and now provide access to more than 4,500 hand-picked luxury and character hotels in over 75 countries worldwide. Splendia has a headcount of 85 people in three offices worldwide (Hong Kong Barcelona & Miami). They offer an inspiring choice of original hotels to suit every taste. Very well done website with a displays images of each type of room.
